title: The Migrant experience. Parts 5 and 6 (Captioned)
creator_contributor_role: Australian Institute of Multicultural Affairs, production company
viewing_guidelines: CAPTIONED: suitable for hearing impaired viewers
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Australia - Emigration and immigration
abstract: Something old, something new--Are you fair dinkum?
description: A series of six episodes that present a comprehensive history of the role of migration in the development of Australia. Part 5 "Something old, something new." looks at the search for personal balance between old traditions and new ways. Part 6 "Are you fair dinkum?" explores the changes brought about by an increasingly multicultural society.
